name: Defensive Football - Ludum Dare 40
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 41.    

I'm going to be honest and say that I do not like the game.  I think it turned out awful in the final build.   Unity for some reason shoved a load of bugs to it in the final build that were not there in the editor.   For example,  in the editor:  the zombies sped up each level - but they do not in the final build.

My Ludum Dare submission page details what went wrong.   I do apologize for the poor,  poor quality of this game.  I promise it will be better next Ludum Dare.
